body:
I see there’s an Android app. I understand that the app development & publishing process for Apple is a bit painful, but I was wondering if a plan for an iOS app was in the works already.

EDIT: This is something I’d love to contribute to as I’ve been learning Python and some other languages/frameworks for the past year, but that doesn’t lend me the ability to develop anything for iOS.
body_html:
I see there’s an Android app. I understand that the app development & publishing process for Apple is a bit painful, but I was wondering if a plan for an iOS app was in the works already.

EDIT: This is something I’d love to contribute to as I’ve been learning Python and some other languages/frameworks for the past year, but that doesn’t lend me the ability to develop anything for iOS.
title: Are there plans for an iOS app?

The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

body:
What you can do to have an iOS app is:

1. Go to ruqqus.com on your phone.
2. Tap the share button (should be at the bottom center of the page).
3. Tap Add to Home Screen.
4. Tap Add.
5. Open it and you now have a fully functional mobile iOS app.
body_html:
What you can do to have an iOS app is:

  1. Go to ruqqus.com on your phone.
  2. Tap the share button (should be at the bottom center of the page).
  3. Tap Add to Home Screen.
  4. Tap Add.
  5. Open it and you now have a fully functional mobile iOS app.

post.body:
I see there’s an Android app. I understand that the app development & publishing process for Apple is a bit painful, but I was wondering if a plan for an iOS app was in the works already.

EDIT: This is something I’d love to contribute to as I’ve been learning Python and some other languages/frameworks for the past year, but that doesn’t lend me the ability to develop anything for iOS.
post.body_html:
I see there’s an Android app. I understand that the app development & publishing process for Apple is a bit painful, but I was wondering if a plan for an iOS app was in the works already.

EDIT: This is something I’d love to contribute to as I’ve been learning Python and some other languages/frameworks for the past year, but that doesn’t lend me the ability to develop anything for iOS.
post.title: Are there plans for an iOS app?

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

parent.body: After our public API is released, we can then focus on native apps.
parent.body_html: After our public API is released, we can then focus on native apps.
